Like most food staorage facilities we use anhydrous ammoniafor our refrigeration system.Ammonia is the best refrigerant available for our needs, due to its moderate toxicity, slight flammable, and its excellent detection properties.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
US Food Service is committed to maintaining a safe manufacturing operation for our employees and the surronding community. Our refrigeration system complies with local, state, and federal applicable codes and industry consensus codes.  Our Ammonia Safety Program priority is to prevent accidental releases of Ammonia instead of merely responding to problems. 
Our PSM/ RMP Program includes the elements  addressing:                                                                                                                                                                          

-Employee Participation: We involve our employees at all appropriate opportuniites to participate in the Ammonia Safety Program.                                                                                                                                                                             

- Process Safety Information: We maintain information relating to the safety of the and the refrigeration system design.                                                                                                                                                                                

-Process Hazard Analysis: We conducted detailed process hazard reviews to ensure all potential hazards have been evaluated and are mitagated.

-Operating Procedures: We provide written operating procedures for activites involving the Ammonia System to ensure employees understand and follow the required operational requirements.                                                                                                                                                                       

-Mechanical Integrity: (Maintenance and Quality Control): We have established a comprehensive program of inspections along with  preventative maintenance activiites to ensure the Ammonia Systems properly maintained to prevent a release of ammonia.                                                                                                                                                                            

-Training: We train our maintenance mechanics in safe operation and maintenance of the ammonia system. All employees are trained in the hazards of ammonia and the emergency response procdures.                                                                                                                                                                           

-Management of Change: Alterations or design changes to the Ammmonia System are screened using the Management of Change process to evaluate the potential safety impacts of the change.                                                                                                                                                                               

-Pre Start Up Safety Reviews: For changes that have been through the MOC process that effect safety of the ammonia system. A pre start up review is required to be completed before system startup.                                                                                                                                                                                

-Contractors: We carefully screen our contractors who work o

n our property that could possibly impact our ammonia system.                                                                                                                                                                               

-Hot Work Permits: We strictly control welding and other work that has the potential to cause a fire through our Hot Work Permit Process.                                                                                                                                                                              

-Emergency Response: We have a developed a written emergency response plan for the Facility. Employees, palnt emeregcny response personnel, and outside agencies ar trained and familiar woth our plan.                                                                                                                                                                                    

-Incident Investigation: After an incident we conduct an investigation to determine the root causes and implement corrective actions to prevent reoccurence.                                                                                                                                                                        

-Compliance Audits: Every three years an outside party conducts a Process Safety Management  Program Review to evaluate the effectiveness of our PSM Program. Trade Secrets: OSHA and EPA requires us to maintain a trade secrets progam in case confidentail information affecting the safety of the ammonia system is ever found.                                                                                                                                                                                  

-Management System: An overall management system monitirs the ongoing process and effectiveness of our safety program.

We used the EPA's Ammonia Refrigeration Guidance document to estimate the hazard levels  (See the Risk Management Plan available from the Environmental Protection agency). .For details on off site impacts; due to National Security concerns the US Government has advised the regulated community not to disclose the actual numerical data in this executive summay.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      

Through our RMP Program, US Foods looks for continuous improvements to the RMP/ PSM Program and the Ammonia System Safety Controls.
